evidence.source_document: Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law
evidence.text: for trial to commence on October 3, 2022. The Court received the testimony of numerous witnesses over eight trial days and received into evidence hundreds of exhibits.

evidence.source_document: Memorandum Opinion and Order Denying Without Prejudice the Parties' Motion to Limine to Exclude Expert Testimony
evidence.text: The Panel has scheduled a bench trial for this case, which is to commence on October 3, 2022, at the J. Waites Waring Federal Judicial Center in Charleston, South Carolina.

evidence.text: After expedited discovery, trial ran from mid-January 2002 to mid-February 2002.
